name: Stephanie Sanchez
coverLetter:
I have not trimmed before but I am looking for a position where I feel comfortable with the product and its intention.

Experience in line operations, worked at a warehouse(Loot Crate) for 12 months, doing assembly, pallet and packaging.  

Worked food service jobs, Universal Studios, restaurant dishwasher in Beverly Hills

I know different strains of marijuana and I am interested in learning how to treat and tend various plants. 

Able to sit for up to 8-10 hour shifts as needed in past jobs.

Trained in fast moving operations and attention to detail.

Understands how to keep an operation moving and producing, respectively.

I have traveled across America this year, lived in North Dakota for six months, New Jersey, New York City this summer.
I am in my hometown of Los Angeles traveling alone. I am hoping to find employment or a gig somewhere with like-minded humans. I can adapt and excel in any situation presented.

I would travel states to work with your company.
